name: deep (Una)
description:
An IRC joke gone wrong. If you're prone to seizures, do not enter the Konami code. And press space slowly, I guess.

If the viewport's too small, the box may just say "press". It means to say "press space".

This is the objectively superior HTML5 version. For the inferior Unity version made by the person who originally made the joke, see https://darkevilmac.itch.io/deep.

You can play the classic version, which is identical to the Unity version, at https://unascribed.com/deepclassic.html.

Your current angle saves to local storage, so you can spin some, leave, and spin again later. Assuming your browser doesn't eat your save file.
